name: Catnip Fever
description:
The cats have escaped! The lure of the nip was too strong, and now they wander through the park, dazed and confused. Rescue the cats by returning them to their proper homes!

Design: Evan Miller
Code: Sam Raymer and Jaime Baker
Art: Yoh Handa, Myra Lara and Andrew Yan
Sound: Matthew Fiebelkor

Made for Global Game Jam 2021

v0.1.1 -

  • Player now looks like they aren't holding a cat when they aren't holding a cat, even after they WERE holding a cat.
  • The hose now appears from the side of the screen, rather than the center, and animates when a kitty's about to come out
